From Wiktionary, the free dictionary

Galician

[edit]

Etymology

[edit]

Borrowed from Latin sollicitāre.

Verb

[edit]

solicitar (first-person singular present solicito, first-person singular preterite solicitei, past participle solicitado)

  1. to solicit, request

Conjugation

[edit]

Portuguese

[edit]

Etymology

[edit]

Borrowed from Latin sollicitāre.

Pronunciation

[edit]
 
  • (Brazil) IPA(key): /so.li.siˈta(ʁ)/ [so.li.siˈta(h)]
  • (Brazil) IPA(key): /so.li.siˈta(ʁ)/ [so.li.siˈta(h)]
    • (São Paulo) IPA(key): /so.li.siˈta(ɾ)/
    • (Rio de Janeiro) IPA(key): /so.li.siˈta(ʁ)/ [so.li.siˈta(χ)]
    • (Southern Brazil) IPA(key): /so.li.siˈta(ɻ)/
 
  • (Portugal) IPA(key): /su.li.siˈtaɾ/
  • (Portugal) IPA(key): /su.li.siˈtaɾ/
    • (Southern Portugal) IPA(key): /su.li.siˈta.ɾi/

  • Hyphenation: so‧li‧ci‧tar

Verb

[edit]

solicitar (first-person singular present solicito, first-person singular preterite solicitei, past participle solicitado)

  1. to request (to ask somebody to do something)
    Synonyms: pedir, requerer, requisitar

Conjugation

[edit]
    Conjugation of solicitar (See Appendix:Portuguese verbs)

First-person
(eu) 		Second-person
(tu) 		Third-person
(ele / ela / você) 		First-person

Personal solicitar solicitares solicitar solicitarmos solicitardes solicitarem

Masculine solicitado solicitados
Feminine solicitada solicitadas

Imperfect solicitava solicitavas solicitava solicitávamos solicitáveis solicitavam
Preterite solicitei solicitaste solicitou solicitamos1, solicitámos2 solicitastes solicitaram
Pluperfect solicitara solicitaras solicitara solicitáramos solicitáreis solicitaram
Future solicitarei solicitarás solicitará solicitaremos solicitareis solicitarão

Future solicitar solicitares solicitar solicitarmos solicitardes solicitarem
Imperative
Affirmative solicita solicite solicitemos solicitai solicitem
Negative (não) não solicites não solicite não solicitemos não soliciteis não solicitem

1Brazilian Portuguese.
2European Portuguese.

Spanish

[edit]

Etymology

[edit]

Borrowed from Latin sollicitāre.

Pronunciation

[edit]
  • IPA(key): /soliθiˈtaɾ/ [so.li.θiˈt̪aɾ] (Spain)
  • IPA(key): /solisiˈtaɾ/ [so.li.siˈt̪aɾ] (Latin America, Philippines)
  • Rhymes: -aɾ
  • Syllabification: so‧li‧ci‧tar

Verb

[edit]

solicitar (first-person singular present solicito, first-person singular preterite solicité, past participle solicitado)

  1. to request, to ask for, to solicit
    Synonym: pedir
  2. (physics) to attract

Conjugation

[edit]
    Conjugation of solicitar (See Appendix:Spanish verbs)

1Mostly obsolete, now mainly used in legal language.
2Argentine and Uruguayan voseo prefers the tú form for the present subjunctive.
